title: Middleware & Request/Response Handling
description: Learn Fiber middleware patterns by building a blog API with custom logging, authentication, CORS, rate limiting, and error handling middleware.
short_description: Build middleware for logging, auth, CORS, rate limiting, and error handling
learning_objectives: Understand Fiber middleware patterns and execution order
Implement custom middleware for logging and authentication
Handle cross-origin requests with CORS middleware
Implement rate limiting to protect API endpoints
real_world_connection: Middleware patterns are essential for production APIs: authentication, logging, rate limiting, and error handling are used in every serious web application.
requirements: Implement request ID generation and propagation
Create custom logging middleware with timing information
Add CORS support for cross-origin requests
Implement rate limiting (100 requests per minute per IP)
Protect routes with API key authentication
Handle errors consistently across all endpoints
bonus_points: Create health check with system metrics
